jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Do you enjoy mining insights from the sea of data, building data products, and design experiments with the ability to see the real-time impact of your contribution? If you are, you might be the one we are looking for! 

You will get to work with insanely driven and smart engineers, business leads, designers, and of course fellow analysts. Your insights will impact how the senior leaders prioritize new features and shape strategy -- anything to hit the north star metrics!

Ideal candidates have excellent business acumen, are highly technical, and have great communication skills.
jobsJson.description:
Do you enjoy mining insights from the sea of data, building data products, and design experiments with the ability to see the real-time impact of your contribution? If you are, you might be the one we are looking for! 

You will get to work with insanely driven and smart engineers, business leads, designers, and of course fellow analysts. Your insights will impact how the senior leaders prioritize new features and shape strategy -- anything to hit the north star metrics!

Ideal candidates have excellent business acumen, are highly technical, and have great communication skills.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Design and analyze experiments using best practices from academia
  • Perform exploratory data analysis using SQL and R/Python
  • Present interesting findings to business stakeholders to drive business and strategic decisions
  • Build machine learning models using R/Python to segment users and reduce burn
  • Build internal tools using R Shiny / Python Dash to reduce human bottlenecks
  • Be the center of excellence for the company’s experimentation practice
  • Develop dashboards to track KPIs

• Minimum 4 years of analytical experience
  • Strong SQL and R/Python skills
  • Strong statistics and experimental design knowledge
  • Strong communication skills in English
  • Strong data visualization skills
  • Balance attention to detail with swift execution
